snippet: The Phoenix Suns and Michael Beasley, who was arrested a month ago on drug charges, reached an agreement to terminate his contract.
lead_paragraph: The Phoenix Suns and Michael Beasley, who was arrested a month ago on drug charges, reached an agreement to terminate his contract.

headline.main: Suns and Beasley Agree to End Contract
headline.print_headline: Suns and Beasley Agree to End Contract
